${modID}:AlwaysMad.NAME: Always Mad
${modID}:AlwaysMad.DESCRIPTION: No longer receive double damage while in Wrath.

${modID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${modID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity. When you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Strength.

${modID}:Unraveling.NAME: Unraveling
${modID}:Unraveling.DESCRIPTION: Play all of your cards from left to right. Targets are chosen randomly. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
${modID}:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with unused [W] , draw that many additional cards next turn.

${modID}:Flick.NAME: Flick
${modID}:Flick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an enemy is *Flicked 3 times, they take !M! damage.

${modID}:Truth.NAME: Truth
${modID}:Truth.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Truth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
${modID}:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Clarity.NAME: Clarity
${modID}:Clarity.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Add 1 to your hand. NL Exhaust the other.
${modID}:Clarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Add 1 to your hand. NL Exhaust the rest.

${modID}:Prediction.NAME: Prediction
${modID}:Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:RetreatingHand.NAME: Retreating Hand
${modID}:RetreatingHand.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. If the previous card played was an Attack, return this card to your hand.
${modID}:RetreatingHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the previous card played was an Attack, return this card to your hand.

${modID}:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
${modID}:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Torrent.NAME: Torrent
${modID}:Torrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BigBrain.NAME: Big Brain
${modID}:BigBrain.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Polymath.NAME: Polymath
${modID}:Polymath.DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlowState.NAME: Flow State
${modID}:FlowState.DESCRIPTION: Wrath: Enter Calm. NL Calm: Enter Wrath. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FlowState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Wrath: Enter Calm. NL Calm: Enter Wrath.
